sentences.english: Root pity in thy heart that when it grows.
sentences.chinese: 讓哀憐的種子在你心裏暗長。

sentences.english: My sister always takes pity on some stray cats or dogs.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹總是哀憐無家可歸的貓或狗。

sentences.english: Life is too short for long pity parties.
sentences.chinese: 生活對悠長的哀憐總是是不足的。

sentences.english: I got a lot of pity.
If children live with pity, they learn to feel sorry for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 如果孩子在哀憐的環境中生活，他們學會感到自憐。

sentences.english: He is a miserable little person.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個哀憐的身段矮小的人。

sentences.english: The poor woman had a third baby.
sentences.chinese: 阿誰哀憐的婦女又生了一個寶寶。
